Description:
There is a customer plugin defined some customer aggregation functions. I have put it in eclipse's plugins folder and restart the eclipse. When I insert a aggregtion builder from palette to table, exception occurs: org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Cannot instantiate aggregation factory OPTIMISTICSUM. I have checked that I didn't put the class files in correct folder. And I'd like to know I haven't use that aggregation function why I failed to insert the aggregation? Please help me to investigate this issue. 

Build number:
